body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture          Glen Echo Park Glen Echo Park has been a park dedicated American leisure for over 120 years. Glen Echo Park has survived three different owners and uses: a National Chautauqua, an amusement park, and a National Park. A short history of Glen Echo Park is available for you to download OR you can use the links to the left under "History & Culture" to find out more about Glen Echo Park's rich history.
